title: help¡¡¡¡¡¡¡
body:
pls do someone know how can i fix this


well i am having troubles at joining chat i can join perfectly to the client but to chat i never join any help?

replies.body: yes but i can play pretty good at 72 ms but in loging at a chat room i cannnot

Your network has to connect to these services, so even though you are in the client you might have issues specifically reaching pvp.net.  In this case, I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and resolve whatever is causing that disconnect.  Let me know if it helps.
